subject: Hs Pro Shifter the h/sq
description_text:
Hi,
How is the notchyness of the shifter? Tight and precise?
Is it soft, medium or hard resistance in the shifts?

 Is anything adjustable?
Also, how loud is it?

Thank you,
Jarett

conversations.body_text: Hi Jarett Barnes,  This feeling is difficult to describe in words; we recommend purchasing it and experiencing it firsthand.Â
